snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said a barrier was needed to protect Israel from “infiltration and terrorism” by extremists.
abstract: Israel announces it is constructing border fence along length of its armistice line with Syria in Golan Heights and is coordinating its intelligence with United States; Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu says barrier is needed to protect Israel from 'infiltration and terrorism' by extremists.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said a barrier was needed to protect Israel from “infiltration and terrorism” by extremists.

headline.seo: Israel Plans to Build Syrian Border Fence
headline.main: Israel Plans to Construct a Syrian Border Fence
headline.print_headline: Israel Plans to Construct A Syrian Border Fence

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
